document_data.name: Guthmere
document_data.mainbody: The '''Guthmeres''' were a [[patriar]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] around [[1482 DR]]. They owned many butcheries and tanneries.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Lady [[Eshvelt Guthmere]] was a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] of Baldur's Gate and was a supporter of law and order brought forth by the [[steel watcher]]s and their creator â€“ the lowborn Lord [[Enver Gortash]].
